EmailTemplate.description: Response that we replied by secure email
EmailTemplate.name: Axos Bank - Secure Response sent
EmailTemplate.subject: Secure Response has been sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name}
Your inquiry has been assigned Case ID {!Case.CaseNumber}.
A new response has arrived from Axos Bank.
To view your response:
1. Sign into Online Banking.
2. Click Contact Us.
3. Go to your message inbox to view the response.
Thank you,
Axos Bank
